html: Wow. Thank you. The change we seek is within us and while that can be scary and intimidating, it is hopeful and deeply empowering. We have crossed a threshold, when we realize that, "I am the change." I love love this:  "the way I see the world will become the world I see." In cleaning metaphor, the real cleaning that needs to happen is within, not without and that speaks to a potency within, that our society has a tendency to discount. The mop needs much more cleaning than the floor.
